trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Santa Rosa
There was one other sighting in Santa Rosa on or around December 31st 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWe witnessed similar orbs as in Antioch Ca. We are West of Antioch and they appeared to be heading West towards the Pacific ocean. They seemed to be glowing and changing their height . After 5 or so minutes they appeared to blink and they where gone.
